attributes.title: Don’t download please
attributes.review:
This at my my phone glitch so bad that it almost broke my phone so I don’t deal with racist homophobe’s and the prices on here are our greatest I mean completely outrageous I hate trump he’s so gross I’m not gonna deal with this I am coming at me thank you please don’t download this it’s horrible nobody wants well nobody should want this app it’s extremely annoying and Outrageous. Thank you and I’m begging you don’t download this.

Sincerely ~ Carly Fox

attributes.title: Don’t get this app😔
attributes.review: I got this app for my stunning✨ president🧡 but when I got the app📱 it then crashed my whole phone 💥📱 I’m commenting on a new phone 📱 because the old one lit up into flames🔥 so since i loved 🧡my president so much I downloaded the app again 🎊 but instantly my mom died 😔 I decided to look past that👁👄👁 and Go further into the app 📱😌 and my house burnt down 😤 then a bunch of orange 🍊 ninjas with guns shooting tupes at me 👴I suggest not to download this app😔

attributes.title: Spam
attributes.review: The entire app is just basically spam texts and emails. The emails do make you feel special ✨they are personally from the president to you🧚🏻‍♂️. As always I want to talk to him personally and now I can yay. But the thing is it seems verry general and not at all personal. I wanted trump to support my personal vendetta against everyone who wasn’t a cis strait white male but sadly that isn’t what the emails are about. (Who else is here from tik tok and hates trump).

attributes.title: Guys my toenails help
attributes.review: So, I was on my way to download this app to support our Cheeto of a president, but when I opened the app the president himself climbed out of my tablet and started aggressively sucking my hair I said “ OWO mr president San, would you like to get you a bottle of milk uWu” he said “ yes, and I will also read you a bedtime story. I soon fell asleep and found trump had stolen my left arm, my goldfish and three of my toenail, if you see them please contact me at 1-800 the Cheeto president stole my toenail

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: this app got my dog stolen. it asked for my location so i obviously complied. the next day i was taking my dog out for a walk and then this big red truck pulled up next to me waving a trump flag. they told me that they wanted my dog and wouldn’t take anything else as i had my iphone xr and airpods in. they STOLE my dog and threw her collar out of the window as they flew their trump flag in the bed of the truck. this app is disgusting and the guys who stole my dog are uncultured swines so in my response, no❤️

attributes.title: HAPPY PRIDE MONTH
attributes.review: guys!!❤️🧡💛💚💙💜pride month just ended and I wanted to wish the ENTIRE lgbtq+ community a happy pride month. love without limit!!! 🏳️‍🌈 i came out as bisexual this month to all of my friends and i’m hoping i’ll have the courage to do it to my family soon! i’m so proud of all the people who have spoken their truth and lived in their real skin even if it was looked down upon. never give up this fight, we are beautiful individually and stunning united. BERNIE 2020 !! ACAB !! 1312 !!

attributes.title: My story...💀
attributes.review: When I first saw this app I thought that it was gonna be good. But when I opened the app I was blinded my a bright orange person🍊🤡. My phone unfortunately exploded from such an orange thing😩(I am using my sisters phone). I couldn’t see for a whole month❌👁and had to get eye surgery. Fortunately my eyes are way better now. I am on the search for a new phone📱 . I do not recommend this app if you want to keep your eyes healthy..😟

attributes.title: Just perfect ✨
attributes.review: So being the best American I can be, I decided to download the app every good American should have! ❤️ So when I downloaded my soul got sucked out of me. 😰😔 I felt empty and hollow before quickly closing the app and praying! 🙏🏾 When I went to my mirror I noticed my hairline had receded and I was orange! 😭😢 Don’t download this please!! You will be orange, very round (aka fat) and a horrible hairline! 😫🥺 You will also loose hair at the top of your head! Be careful gen z! 🙏🏾😓

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I couldn’t even load into the app because it wouldn’t let me. The one time it actually let me in it started making really loud screeching sounds out of my phone and once I exited they stopped. I wasn’t sure what it was so I opened the app again and it did it again. I can’t recommend this app because it was a really scary experience and I still have no idea what the sounds were.

attributes.title: Never Again
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I was told that was how I could obtain my citizenship. The app is terrible. It crashes all the time and I have to snort Adderal to get it going again. Morning, noon, and night. Snort, snort, snort. The only time this app works is when I’m on a golf course. But I still have to snort Adderal. Snort, snort, snort. If you love your family and yourself, you won’t download this app. It will take your soul, your humanity, and your sanity.
